alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:35PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ziebach, northeastern Meade and southeastern Perkins Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 335 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Durkee Lake, or 9 miles southwest of Faith, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Faith, Red Scaffold, Durkee Lake and Intersection of Cherry Creek and Sunnybrook Roads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach
